title: El Salvador: Citi Solutions Fair Offers Clients Financial Alternatives
summary: San Salvador, El Salvador – Citi El Salvador will be hosting the Citi Solutions Fair, aiming to provide clients with the best solutions to their financial needs.
tag-1: El Salvador: Citi Solutions Fair Offers Clients Financial Alternatives
tag-2: San Salvador, El Salvador – Citi El Salvador will be hosting the Citi Solutions Fair, aiming to provide clients with the best solutions to their financial needs.
tag-3: The Citi Solutions Fair is a specially designed initiative that offers matured-debt consolidation, which could range from 90 days to cases already in court, covering personal loans, mortgages or credit cards – all within each client's payment capabilities.
tag-4: Citi is particularly committed to its clients and strives to meet their needs. Citi offers tailored services for consolidating financial debt. The Citi Solutions Fair is a place where attendants can obtain advice from Citi's subject-matter experts and channel inquiries on their financial status.
tag-5: Keeping in mind availability, convenience and accessibility for clients, Citi opened its call center at 2509-7000, on July 23 and 24 from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. Agents will answer questions and work together to find the best financial solution to fit the needs of clients.
tag-6: Any person from eastern and western El Salvador can attend the fairs that will be hosted in San Miguel on July 30 (2 p.m.-6 p.m.) and 31 (8:30 a.m.-6 p.m.) at the Citibank Centro branch; as well as in Santa Ana on August 13 (2 p.m.-6 p.m.) and 14 (8:30 a.m.-6 p.m.) at the Citibank ByPass branch.
tag-7: "At Citi, we are constantly looking for a closer relationship with our clients, that's why our Solutions Fair is a valid opportunity to establish those relationships as well as getting to know their financial needs and helping them reach a solution," said Martha Peralta, collections VP, Citi El Salvador.
tag-8: In order to get more information about the Citi Solutions Fair, please contact Citi executives through Citiphone at 2212-2000, or visit your nearest Citibank branch where Citi will be pleased to serve you!
tag-9: Citi encourages clients to take part of the Citi Solutions Fair – together we can make it happen.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
